data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There presently exists no expert systems within the AI namespace.
    Although this could also be called AI::ProductionRules or
    AI::InferenceEngine ExpertSystem will be more easily recognised by
    non AI specialists.

    It also allows for other styles of expert system to be listed under
    AI::ExpertSystem::*.
